ProcessTemplates.Name: CSV files to Snowflake table
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template will upload local CSV files to Snowflake table stage. Then the file content is inserted to the Snowflake table.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/path/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The path to the local folder containing the CSV file(s)."},"SnowflakeTable":{"Value":"\"exambletable\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The Snowflake table where the CSV file(s) content is inserted."},"SnowflakeConnectionString":{"Value":"\"host=myorganization-myaccount.snowflakecomputing.com;account=myaccount;user=myusername;password=mypassword;warehouse=mywh;role=myrole;db=mydb;schema=myschema;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The connection string required to access the table."}}
